website_summaries.verdict: Create a range of bright and bold looks with these highly pigmented and unique colors.
pros: Ultimate palette available in 3 complementary color schemes: The Brights, Cool Neutrals, and Smokey & High
Pigmented shades that still blend easily
Stays in place for hours even without primer
cons: You may experience some fallout with this palette

customer_reviews.title: fake
customer_reviews.text: I even don't want to give one star!it‘s a fake,don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 my favorite palette I own. It doesn’t swatch too pretty, but it’s SO gorgeously pigmented and buildable when applied with a brush. I never remember to use a primer, and occasionally remember concealer (set with powder before shadow), yet it’s still super bright. It blends beautifully, and a little goes a long way. The only thing that caught me by surprise is that they’re not all matte. A couple shades have a bit of shimmer but it’s not overly noticeable, which I prefer since I’m more of a matte person. Totally worth the money. Btw, if u want to see more looks of this, my insta is @http.spacekid
customer_reviews.author: Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Bright, long lasting colors for cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my all time favorite palettes. I don't have a lot of money to spend on makeup, but I wanted a colorful palette that gave me a good value and was decent quality. I'm really happy with this one -- I use a primer on my lids to keep the shadow in place, and it stays pretty well all day and even into the next morning. The colors are BRIGHT and I always get compliments. They also blend well. I attached just one look I've done with this palette.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: None of the eye-shadows came cracked or powdery. The product came in perfect condition, and there were tubing rolls in the box to keep the package from rumbling around. I bought this product mainly for the orange and yellow shades, and they look nice. When I blend them with other glitter shades from my bh and two faced peach palettes, they come out nice. There is a "bit" of fall out, but it's not overwhelming in any way whatsoever. :)
customer_reviews.author: Soyoung Yang

customer_reviews.title: don’t hesitate, just buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: as a cosmetologist i was worried it would be very sheer , or come broken, but that’s wasnt the case. i feel like this is a really nice cheap pallet. i swatched it on my finger tips in the 3rd picture, then wiped it on my wrists for the 4th picture. very smooth and buildable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm extra
customer_reviews.text: I like nyx products, and this is a good variety of colors. However, it cost me over $20 including shipping...and the quality isn't there. Yes it's a little chalky. I think this palette is worth $8. In this case I went with the "brand," and I'm sure I could have gotten more pow pow for my coin. Naw wha I mean? I'm too lazy to return it and have no bright colored eyeshadow so I make it work. Dam* you consumerism.
customer_reviews.author: d0ubl3ra1nb0w

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors, great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I have used all the colors in the palette. It's very versatile, you can make everything from simple everyday looks to super dramatic smokey eyeshadow. It's a great palette to travel with because it has everything from highlights, transitions, to dark shades and metallics. The dark colors can have some fallout, but you can just do your shadow before your foundation and wipe the fallout off. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: OJG28

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t spread or blend!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are beautiful but when I went to use it for the first time I was so disappointed the eye shadow did not blend at all. When I tried to do the Smokey eye it looked at blotchy. This eyeshadow is hard as rock and doesn’t spread at all. Definitely returning this item. Very sad cause I was looking forward to the nice vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: SEM1983

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but look at other pallets too
customer_reviews.text: I have been using make up for 7 years and I have been doing makeup professionally for 3 years. The colors are good and pigmented, but they are really difficult to blend. Also, if you don’t use a base they crease really easily and pretty much melt off of your face after a few hours. I thought that the pallet would be bigger, but it is tiny. For so little product it is very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Owens

customer_reviews.title: A great basic palette for dark skin
customer_reviews.text: This palette is PERFECT! It goes on well with or without primer, and shows up on my dark skin. I use this almost everyday for natural and full blown makeup looks
customer_reviews.author: BriyGilgeous

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful eyeshadow in natural shades! I’ve used all the colors in this palette and it’s lasted months. It’s amazing! Some matte, some shimmer. Great pigment throughout, and none of the shades are too shimmery. All versatile, functional colors. The one downside is the box does NOT travel well. When it closes there’s enough space above the powders that they easily get loose and knocked around. It can take a few knocks, but try to keep it flat or you could end up with a powdery mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time
customer_reviews.text: I love NYX, but this palette was horrible! Poor poor pigment and very chalky and powdery.. Its not even good enough for my girls playtime with makeup! No color pay off whatsoever...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun colors!!! But not as pigmented as I would like...
customer_reviews.text: I lovvveee this pallet, the colors are so fun to play with. The only thing that I disliked was it was not as pigmented as I would like. I really had to spend a lot of time layering the colors on. Overall though the color is buildable.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great color choices,  easy to blend!
customer_reviews.text: My kids got me the bright colored pallet for Christmas, so when I thought I needed some Smokey colors for concerts I instantly thought of this brand due to how well my other pallet held up. I love the color choices and after 2 hours of wear I haven't had any smudging! I can't wait to see how well this holds up during my next concert, if it holds up to heat and sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Not pigmented at all!
customer_reviews.text: I got this pallet for pride and let me say this pallet was the worst! I could get barely any pigment to show up and when I did, it was super streaky and patchy. I went as far as wetting my make up brush with setting powder to maybe get more pigment and it did but again very patchy and not at all as I was expecting. Save your money and just buy the color pop collection
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Not Very Pigmented
customer_reviews.text: I like NYX makeup, so I figured this would be a great palette. I liked the colors in it. However, it has HORRIBLE pigment! I really dug my brush in there and it still came out like nothing was on my brush! I returned it!
customer_reviews.author: OneWhisper

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant and blends well
customer_reviews.text: This palette is beautiful, vibrant, and versatile. I bought it for my Halloween makeup as Poison Ivy, and it blended evenly. I used eyeshadow primer, and the makeup stayed on all day. I did use some sparkle shadow from Color Pop with this look, but the yellows and light/ medium greens are from the Nyx palette, as well as the red in my eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Stephie M

customer_reviews.title: Colors are spot on
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this eyeshadow palette. I am a slightly warmer neutral skin tone, and the warm neutral colors are spot on and perfectly pigmented. They are easily buildable and don't have fallout that I've noticed at all. I have tried so many different shadows and I can't see myself going outside of this one, ever. I love that it's mostly matte shades with just a few shimmery ones mixed in. The price point is perfect too. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Meh...bad batch? TERRIBLE packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I am unsure if I got a bad batch, or if NYX is great and this is a fake. Packaging was terrible!!! Came scratched to high heaven. I am just lucky the pigments were still in their pans. Average to below average pigment intensity. Requires a ton of layering. Heads up. Fine if you're looking for something more sheer and have a primer and a setting spray. Take a chance? Maybe you'll get lucky...maybe it would be worth it to buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: NYX eye shadow Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Website did not state that the product was Made in China. It looks pretty but I didn't even open. Seller, please update the description to include where it was made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Have sooo much fun playing with diff looks. None are unusable, as in love all the colors and compliment one another. Great for travel, as all colors give day and nite looks.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Salve

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Knockoff
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought these pallets from Walgreens and I received several compliments an how nice it looked on me. I also saw them on Amazon for a much better price so I bought two of them, but it is not the same quality. The colors are much lighter, it doesn’t last as long as the ones I bought from Walgreens and you have to put a lot more on for it to look like you’re wearing eyeshadow . Even though it says Maybelline and the colors are close, the quality is not the same. I think this is a cheap copycat Knockoff of madeleine’s eyeshadow pallet.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been keeping my eye on this eyeshadow palette for a good while. I finally caved in and bought it to give it a try. I’m not disappointed and I’m not exactly crazy for it just yet. These colors are really vibrant but go on kind of matte and needs a pit of building for a bolder color/ shade. There are a few that are shimmery and the others are just plain colors. In the last 2 pictures I have tried smearing / smudging it off and it seems to still keep its color on my skin. In light and in the lighting that I had in the first comparison
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Cute & fun looks can be created
customer_reviews.text: Good seller so my review has nothing to do with the seller. I love Nyx, they're affordable and cruelty free but this palette lacks pigment..I mean I got it to work but still. Especially the yellow..it doesn't even really show up & I do use the Milani eye primer which works with every eyeshadow..It's a fun & cute palette & I'll keep it of course & continue to use it just know that if you get this he prepared to have to work with the shadows.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR BROWN/BLACK SKIN TONES
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the worst pallet I now own. I understand the whole “you get what you paid for” but I have way cheaper “Wet n wild” pallets that are sooo much better. Tried to do a cute eye look but my cheek ended up getting all the color. That’s how much fallout there is. It’s so chalky it’s ridiculous! DEFINITELY, 100% NOT for black/brown skin. it’s so bad. Save your coins hunny!
customer_reviews.author: Sho Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: It’s cool
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the pigmentation. I did not buy this palette for its regularly intended purposes — but this photo is using one color for the overall blue and 3 other colors for details and then eyeliners. Very quick and simple for Halloween and I’m excited to use this more
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh-Jericho

customer_reviews.title: Below average pigment intensity, badly scratched packaging
customer_reviews.text: I am unsure if I got a bad batch, or if NYX is great and this is a fake. Packaging was terrible!!! Came scratched to high heaven. I am just lucky the pigments were still in their pans. Average to below average pigment intensity. Requires a ton of layering. Heads up. Fine if you're looking for something more sheer and have a primer and a setting spray.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It's nothing impressive
customer_reviews.text: I think this palette is fine for starters or for those of us who are just looking for that VERY particular shade of brown. These work a lot better with an eyeshadow primer, so I wouldn't completely write them off. Otherwise most of the shades apply very meh, without much power to them. These do however make for decent contour shades, so it has it's upsides.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wink

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these palettes. They have great pigmentation. Would recommend. In my opinion they are great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lele

customer_reviews.title: Reviews misleading,  not pigmented.
customer_reviews.text: Many of the other reviews I found deceiving. They would give five stars and attach an image, but the image would show very washed out, ashy shadow. This sort of confused me, and I think many of the reviewers aren't very experienced with makeup. I love Nyx products, but this shadow was quite poorly pigmented, both mattes and shimmers weren't showing up well, and I layered a lot and used eye primer. The packaging was sturdy, and I liked the color choices though.
customer_reviews.author: mmyyli

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of colors in this palette. You can't beat the selection for this price. I was nervous at first because the colors look quite dark, but they blend well. The only problem that I had was that the snap closure was broken when I got it and that it does not come with any applicators. I like to use my own brushes, but it would have been nice to have something in the palette for the quick on the go application.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Bold colors
customer_reviews.text: Bold colors that go on smooth and blend well. I've only had it a short time, so I can't comment on longevity, but it appears to be holding up well. I will say that some of the colors are somewhat dark. Those will be applied with a light hand and will be for subtle blending. I still say it's a good deal due to the blend-ability, neutral palette, and unlimited color options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: You can create a lot of daily look with this. It’s not very pigmented, so you might have to spend more time but it’s good for beginner to slowly build up the color in case ya messed up. There’s not much fallouts, daily look, matte and shimmer, small size( I personally like small palettes to fit in a bag). Overall, it’s a good to have, but you don’t necessarily need it. It could also be a great gift for your friends that’s new to makeup(• ̅⌣ ̅•)
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Probably looks better on lighter skins
customer_reviews.text: I am latinoamerican have light brown skin, my eye area is kind of darker than other areas of my face so these beautiful colors don't pop on my eyes as much as I see they do on lighter skin but still I could manage to do a cute make up that looked nice in camera. The pigmentation is much better than other affordable palettes in the market so it is a good value for money :) I am happy overall
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Pigmented variety of colors at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: After looking for years for an eye shadow palette with a rainbow variety of colors I'm thrilled I found this! I apply this eye shadow with an eye shadow sponge and the colors go on very pigmented. The only real negative is it isn't as long wearing as I would want, the color is less pigmented with hours of wear, however is great for the price! This is my favorite palette of eye shadow and after many uses there is still plenty left for me to wear. When mine runs out I will happily purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: Banana For Scale

customer_reviews.title: Not super pigmentated - an accessory palette
customer_reviews.text: My two issues with this palette is a) it’s not supper pigmented. You can find better value for money elsewhere. b) this is a brights palette and has to have a second palette for darker/lighter/neutral colors plus to see the color well your going to need a good eyeshadow primer. I’m still giving it 5/5 stars because it’s not defective or worthless or anything I just think i’d be happier if I’d spent my money on something else.

customer_reviews.title: Broken or Used/Old? DISGUSTING
customer_reviews.text: I definitely ordered a new makeup palette and this one came damaged. I can’t tell if it’s from poor packaging and care or if the product was used/old because the colors that were broken didn’t appear just broken, they looked balled up and crumbly. Very disappointing. THE WORST PART IS I CANT EVEN RETURN THE ITEM AND GET MY MONEY BACK BECAUSE I CANT ACCESS A POST OFFICE OR UPS BECAUSE OF MY COVID RESTRICTIONS!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Solis

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Excuse my ugly face, but it was pride month and as a new makeup artist, I thought I’d give my input. The color range is not bad at all, this was the first time I have ever used eyeshadow and I found it very user friendly! You don’t need to pack a lot on to get a nice pigmented color except for the obvious colors (yellow/orange) that are lighter and needs a little more product to be easily seen. I didn’t make a dent in any of the colors after constantly redoing it, as I’m new. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Addison

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: While the colors are fun and vibrant in the pan, there is very little color payoff when applied. I even tried to use multiple primers (including white) and the color never quite matches the pan. The formula is also not long-wearing.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLlama

customer_reviews.title: Colors Don't Show Up On My Skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of the bright colors in this palette; however, most of these colors don't show up on my skin although I piled the color on. I am a Black woman, but my complexion is not dark. Thus, I thought these would work for me, no problem. They did not. Therefore, I purchased several other similar palettes from Juvias Place which show up fine. So, if you're Black, these may not work for you in the way you anticipate without a white primer.
customer_reviews.author: Tamia Grey

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: i didn't have very many colorful eye shadow colors to work with, so i ordered this palette for some more colors in my every day look. The colors are all really cute and the formula blends well. Its actually more pigmented than i thought it was going to be, because it wasn't very expensive so i didn't expect much, but the color are over all pretty good in pigmentation. its smaller than i thought it would be, but not tiny. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Pam K.

customer_reviews.title: Surprising
customer_reviews.text: I am a makeup snob and wouldn't normally buy this brand. I purchased it specifically for a couple of the shades for a costume I was wearing in a show. I was really surprised at how bright and pigmented it was. It really held up through hours of sweat and movement. I may check out more Nyx products in the future. They really packed in a lot of quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Burt

customer_reviews.title: So Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really fun colors. I don't experiment with colors that often but since buying this I have stepped outside my comfort zone. I originally bought this for my Beetlejuice costume. I used the purples around the eye and the green around the the edge of the face. The reason for loosing a star is that it is not that pigmented. You have to use primer or it will barely show up. After that you may even need to use multiple coats to get true color.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Really nice but sort of hard to blend.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not that good at makeup and I don't really use eye shadow much, but this was really easy to use. I love the yellow color especially because it flatters my eyes really nicely and the colors in generall are gorgeous. I don't know much about makeup but I like the palette. HOWEVER it is hard to blend and the colors got a little muddy when mixed.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Lots of colors
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add more brightly colored eyeshadows to my collection without breaking the bank and this palette was the perfect solution. The shade are good quality and blend well together for whatever look I want to create and I have received many compliments when I wear these shadows. I always recommend it to my friends and the ones who have it love it too, you definitely won't regret getting it and it's perfect for beginners and people who have been doing makeup for a while like myself who want to add more color to their life.
customer_reviews.author: Lianda

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again..very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: Very sutle colors..I'm licensed cosmotologist..see alot of makeup..hair products..try some new ones but if a product fits my need..why look further Colors pretty..soft..natural.easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: rod b.

customer_reviews.title: Not for dark skin.
customer_reviews.text: Had to use a lot and it got messy, powder falling on my cheeks and lashes. Plus I only used a few colors.
customer_reviews.author: lovelovelove

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors.
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty cool colors, and I look good in warm and cool tones. These aren't too blue/silvery for my olive skin and brown eyes. Great starter palette to get into cooler colors. I don't have an eyelid primer but they stay on really well. If you have the right brushes you can make this go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Nyx Brights is a WINNER!!
customer_reviews.text: I have very pale skin, and the Brights pallet is absolutely stunning for cool skin tones!! The colors are gorgeous, and the pigment is great as long as you use either your finger, a wet brush, or primer. I own several high end pallets, and I’m very pleased with this one. Very lovely for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Need to improve their boxing method.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars but I took one off because there was no protection during shipping. The item is small and it was probably jumping up and down on its way to me because it wasn’t wrapped in anything. It was in a small box with plenty of room for it to jump up and down. I’m surprised it’s not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: cind-e

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this after a friend recommended this brand. Not expensive and the colors were very vibrant and lasted all day! I used this for a rainbow look for PRIDE and the only reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars is because I had to apply the shadow with my finger to pack on the color better. Using a brush made it look more sheer than I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy Kissinger

customer_reviews.title: Highly Pigmented Set
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I decided to purchase this set. I think its the best pigmented nude eyeshadow set I have. Once you apply a good base, the colors are true to the palette and stay on all day. I am impressed with the quality and you cannot go wrong with the price on Amazon. Will definitely add another set of these.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Needs primer to work
customer_reviews.text: These eye shadows are okay. They need a good primer (I use urban decay primer potion) to really have nice application. With the primer the color is nice and they blend well. Without it they aren’t really pigmented and your eye makeup will look like a 7 year old did it. I would only recommend them if you had a good primer.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, must-have for any makeup enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Such vivid, bright, pigmented shadows! You can create awesome looks with this palette--trust me. This product lasts a really long time, but it comes off when you want it to. I used mine for a Halloween face paint job as an alien. Many compliments! Sets other face paints really well.
customer_reviews.author: CareBear

customer_reviews.title: Not Colorful
customer_reviews.text: The color payoff is a hit and miss...mostly a miss. Some of the colors (like purple) blend completely away. If you’re a beginner interested in playing with color this might be for you. For the more advanced, I would pass. UPDATE: After using the product once I ended up with a rash on both eyelids. Buyers beware
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Patton

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It really sucks it's so chalky and I so excited because the colors are so pretty. I even tried the water trick still was crappy.
customer_reviews.author: Karmen Kaskie

customer_reviews.title: The price is right
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Not incredibly highly pigmented but way better than what you'd expect from a <$10 eye shadow. I'd honestly drop $20 on this pallette as the colors are so great. Wetting the brush does alot for getting a deeper color too. I love this pallette.
customer_reviews.author: Cortez the Killer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely colors
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! The colors pop on tan skin or lighter eyes. Perfect for Summer. On humid days the color does crease on eye but for this price who cares. Well worth it. u get any bronze natural color u could need to acheive a look.
customer_reviews.author: amanda mas

customer_reviews.title: The greatest eye shadow with this price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye shadow box I've bought. The price is cheap compared to other products with the famous brands. The quality, though, is very competitive: It will stay on your skin for a long time. The variety of colors is enough for me if I want to do warm-style eye shadow. I couldn't say how much I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: sunnyjoyce

customer_reviews.title: Nude palette - not much coverage
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I got the nude palette, and found that none of the colors provided much coverage. Had to really layer it on. Yeah, it's a cheap palette, so I wasn't expecting a whole lot from it. That being said, it sounds like this problem is much more with the nude palette than it is with the colorful one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good color range especially if u are experimenting with colors!
customer_reviews.text: Yet to use for a eye look but the color range is really good. Note also all the shadows aren’t mattes but they aren’t exactly shimmers either. Just have a somewhat sprinkled appearance upon a good look. The shadows aren’t creamy they are more powdery. For the price it’s definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: zee

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I was never really into bright eyeshadow colors but I needed a pallet for an event and did not want to spend that much on it. When I got this, everything changed! I fell in love with bright eyeshadows and love to wear them now! It’s a really good pallet for a cheap price! I’m not really good at makeup but these colors are easy to work with. If you’re balling on a budget and want to have fun with some colors, I definitely recommend this one. Great quality, 100% would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shadows, but mine was considerably damaged upon arrival. Super bummed because I'm going to have to be sparing with what I suspect will be my favorite shade. The latch piece was also snapped off, and it was sealed with a sticker, so it wont really be travel friendly like I had hoped. If I purchase this product again, I will get it in store, and NOT through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bug

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead...get it
customer_reviews.text: Not a make up expert but it works fine. Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dainty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our nine year old loves this. Yeslet her play with real make up. Teaching her early how to act and present as a lady. Colors are super bright. Container holds up good. Not as large as I thought it would be. Fits in a little drawer of her vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Lock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for better than average shadows
customer_reviews.text: I use this with NYX shadow primer and it’s almost as good as my favorite Urban Decay palette, at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the colors of this palette. they are more vibrant than the picture shown. Its very transparent at first but then i realized it is in fact buildable. There is some fallout and dust with this shadow, but a good shadow primer goes a long way to make it stay put. That's all there is to it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors of the product, bright and beautiful. I'm starting to get more into doing my makeup and this helps a lot, my skin is sort of dark and it make the greens and pinks really pop. I will say however the colors are very light if you put it on with a makeup brush. I use my finger to get the best results, and it's an easy wash off after. If you dont mind doing that it's all good. But if for some reason you're weird about getting a little dust on your finger it's not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value consistent with price
customer_reviews.text: I realize this is a cheap palette but I'm usually very happy with NYX products. The pigment was definitely lacking and there is a LOT of fall out. Make sure to use with an eyelid primer. Great for kids to mess around but nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but with great colors and stays on
customer_reviews.text: I got this so fast and the pigment is good. stayed on all day. The reason I purchased it is because I saw a lady use it in a demonstration on how to apply makeup. Inexpensive with nice colors and staying power. The only thing I wish it had is the applicator.
customer_reviews.author: jeannette daniels

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this palette it’s a perfect combo of colors for all sorts of adorable looks. My daughter inherited my original a few months ago and I needed another for my colorful looks I like to put together 🌈
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Would've been perfect if it came in one piece
customer_reviews.text: I would get this in store if you can, or order it from another site. For almost twenty dollars, I was very disappointed in the arrival of the product with a broken pan, scratched up palette, and of course the fact the the palette itself was broken. I managed to super glue it back together. The eyeshadow itself is good
customer_reviews.author: Laney

customer_reviews.title: Pigmented and Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely consider myself a beginner when it comes to make-up, but I feel more like a pro when I'm able to use eye shadows that are this pigmented and beautiful! The eye-shadow itself is cheap, but the colors certainly do not look that way!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Vivid color, no staying power
customer_reviews.text: Vivid color, no staying power. I tried this eyeshadow with and without primer, Either way, it didn’t stay put for very long. Very disappointing for how lovely and rich the pigment is.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie D.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this palette to substitute for the James Charles Palette. I've been wanting to get James Charles' palette for a long time but it always sells out so fast, so I thought I'd give this one a try. The pigmentation is pretty good, but not as good as James Charles' palette as far as I can tell. I do like the shade range and I think they blend nicely. Although, it does take quite a lot of layers to make the shade extremely opaque.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought this in order to well, enjoy it and wear it when I do videos, but my eight year old daughter caught me, lol. I was pleasantly surprised at how pigmented it is and how a little gets the job done, the colors stay vibrant and last all day with no primer, finishing powder, or setting spray, so you definitely get more than you think you would for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Dannaldson

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, great for vacations.
customer_reviews.text: Love this palette! I needed something that had a good variety of colors, for a three week out of town trip. This is perfect. It has a nice range of colors. I did put a white base down before applying these colors (I wanted them to really pop). I also has to put a little more on than with some of my palettes. I wish they lasted longer than a few hours, but for the price I'm not disappointed. All in all this is a great product. Picture is with our white base under colors.
customer_reviews.author: amy gerber

customer_reviews.title: Reds
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how many red/reddish shades are in this palette; cute, and pretty neutral, but keep that in mind if you're looking for a neutral palette.
customer_reviews.author: Rea

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Pigment is great, nice color variety and it lasts all day! Due to the price I didn’t expect much but this product is a solid 11/10 compared to some higher dollar pallets.
customer_reviews.author: Cort

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for low price
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and gives off a pretty good, strong color. Offers a good variety of colors as well. Its helpful to apply setting spray to brush before picking up the makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Valente

customer_reviews.title: Pigmented
customer_reviews.text: Came in kinda broken I fixed it so it wasn't really broken the eyeshadow and the whole pan was disconnected but I just put it back in and it never came back out, good color and pigmented, but the other con is it doesnt close.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: I possibly got a dud pallet
customer_reviews.text: I’m not new to makeup I do makeup art and know how to use it and what bases work and don’t to keep pigment bright but the color blended away every time I tried to blend the color even with a base not sure if I got a bad batch because I know people who have had successful blendabity with the same products and even with no base
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this pallet. Definitely use a primer on your eyes before use though. There are so many color options and it’s a great Smokey-Neutral set!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Good Pallette SUPER Affordable
customer_reviews.text: This product is sufficiently pigmented and the colors are bright. The pallette lacks orange, but that seems to be the only color I really miss. Blends out nicely on my skin, not streaky as far as I can tell
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Pigmentations
customer_reviews.text: Pigmentations not that great, lot of fallout but you can buil the color with multiple layers. The purple is very light and definitely has to be built up on color to see it’s purple. Yesllows and blues have nice pay off.
customer_reviews.author: Breeanna Eicher

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice and Affordable Pallet. The colors are as pictured and last for a long Time. I used it to create the looks in the picture. I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good product, if you've lost your brush for applying eye shadow..you will need to buy one, brush not included, case is a bit difficult to open, however the colors are smooth and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B.

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors but didn't realize half of the colors had shimmer/sparkles in them. I was looking for just flat, matte colors. The colors aren't as bright either even with the NYX white eyeshadow base.
customer_reviews.author: artistic_baller

customer_reviews.title: Great for Retro Matte Looks
customer_reviews.text: I have been needing a small sample of odd colours and this seems to be the only palette with all the colours on the spectrum and in a matte finish. Great for retro looks. I am dark skinned and even the lightest lilac shade showed up on my skin. Very impressive for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Davina Colaço

customer_reviews.title: Love the pigmentation
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging. The shades are very pigmented which I like because you don’t have to use a lot of product for the color to pop. I’m a beginner when it comes to makeup and I love the variation of colors that I can use.
customer_reviews.author: Mlssntgo

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pride!
customer_reviews.text: This pallet was perfect for pride! I used it to create a rainbow eye for pride and received many compliments. I loved that there are several shades that all blended really well together. A few of the colors could have been more pigmented but for the price it was actually better than I expected. I would definitely recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these for my friend, because it was on her wishlist. I ordered this one along with the Phoenix version. The other palette came fine, but the bright one came all scratched. I thought it was simply due to it getting tossed around during shipping. I returned that one and got a replacement. I'm now wishing I kept the original one. The 2nd order was even worse. Half of the colors fell out of the pan, and the palette hasn't even been opened. Returning it one last time and won't be considering getting another replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It is so good 👍
customer_reviews.text: This is the one I like most since I started to be interested in making up and keep buying various eyeshadow palettes including brands like Huda. The color is medium pigment, good for daily make up. The powder is very smooth and easy to blend. It looks so natural on my eye. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners, blend easily
customer_reviews.text: This palette is awesome for the price, colors show well when built up. It's a little chalky but with the price what do you expect lol does have fall out. Overall though I love it, I'm a make-up artist usually buy high end stuff. Heard some good things about this little palette so decided to buy and I'm happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Alexsis

customer_reviews.title: Good but not Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Nice palette, pretty colors, but not very opaque. I would purchase baked shadows if you are looking for rich, vibrant, opaque shadow. Otherwise, these are great for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blendable and long wearing
customer_reviews.text: Super fun colors. I don’t have a ton of experience with bold shadows but I wanted a color scheme based on a movie character. I followed a youtube tutorial (Kayla Hagey) on how to apply and blend and it came out pretty well. It wore well and with my 40-something year old skin and deep set eyes, it still looked nice. Now I need more occasions to wear such bright colors!
customer_reviews.author: Just a Dumb Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not pigmented, red stains eyelids
customer_reviews.text: This palette looks really nice from a distance, I was really excited to get it. When it came the first thing I noticed was that none of the colors were very pigmented, and the red looked more like pink on my skin. On top of that if you try and get more out of the red by using a lot of it on your lid, it will stain your skin pink for a little while, probably a day or two ? Anyway it was overall pretty disappointing, I like NYX’s other products like their setting spray and eyebrow pencils, but this was a bust :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pallet for awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Great size for price. Colors are beautiful and shimmery. Have yet to try on but did test colors on arm and color did not fade away easily or dust off. So excited to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Not that great.
customer_reviews.text: Only a few of the colors actually show as bold as it looks. Some colors dont even transfer or blend well. Wouldnt recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C S

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: At the moment this is the only pallet I use. The reds and pink are super pigmented. If you want the other colors to show you need to put conclear on they eyes, use a packing brush and go crazy with it. Dont think a dab of yellows going to be so pigmented. Overall I love a this is defiantly for beginners wanting to experiment. I used the pallet on my Instagram if you want more prooth. @izzykee
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Ultimate Shadow Palette, Eyeshadow Palette, Brights
product_meta.description: Color:BrightsWe named this collection the Ultimate Shadow Palette because that's exactly what it is-a pro-level palette packed with 16 high-performance eyeshadows and pressed pigments in a rainbow of tone-inspired shades. Available in four striking color combinations-Neutral-Cool, Neutral-Warm, Bright and Smokey/Highlight-each set features a vivid mix of velvety-rich textures and mesmerizing finishes that range from mattes and satins to shimmers and metallics.
feature_bullets: EYESHADOW PALETTE: This professional level makeup palette features 16 highly-pigmented shadows that glide onto lids & make eyes pop with color. Use with NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP eyeshadow primer for bolder, longer-lasting color.

ULTIMATE EYE SHADOW: Each high quality eyeshadow palette features a highly pigmented mix of finishes from matte & satin to shimmery & metallic—perfect for your skin tone. Apply primer & build your look.

BOLD & BEAUTIFUL: Eyes pop with NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP eye shadow collection. Choose from eyeshadow primer, matte eyeshadow, cream eyeshadows, gel eyeshadows, liquid eyeshadows, & more with a variety of different finishes to complete your look.
THRIVE WITH CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS: NYX PRPOFESSIONAL MAKEUP is certified and acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty-free brand. We do not test any of our products on animals.
PERFECT TO PAIR WITH: Try with NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Setting Spray, to keep your whole look locked in all day long.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
